Good Comments: Chihiro's not the same without Kristen anymore. This release is just horrible.
It's not good by a longshot, but still the lesser evil out of the options.

I liked their Nourin team up but this one... Why the need to change Onii-chan to "Hey" and other things not just once but several times in EP1? This wasn't the only issue either in their changes. If I want bad editing I'll get it from Xythar or Commie.
i liked the vocabulary they chose compared to EveYuu
Typesetting was well done, and the translation took liberties which worked well and weren't egregiously inaccurate from a casual viewers perspective.
Bad Comments: Some...strange, possibly upsetting word choices here and there, but overall very well put together release.

Good Comments: Only one word describes these subs, Awesome!
Good work for a group I've never heard of.
Watchable, but bland. Doesn't handle jokes well. kdfss is worlds better.
Could really use tighter editing, but still good enough to watch.
>Commie trash known as [kdfss] - It's actually Evetaku, you retard

Did not see any awkwardness from the subs. I did not expect the subs to be great but thankfully I was proven wrong. Great job Chihiro/DameDesuYo! Get this over the Funimation (HS rip), as usual Funi offers a horrible TL, watch ep2 you'll know what I mean.
Was decent but found that kdfss had better translation.
Badass subs, delivering as usual. Lol @ anyone who would go with anything else TBH.
Bad Comments: Glorious fansubs here to save us from cancer official 'translation'

A vast improvement over the official subs & Commie trash known as [kdfss] (hiding their staff list but grabs a blue at nyaa for obvious favoritism & spoon benefits) with typeset, honorifics, karaoke OP/ED. No other group to go with whatsoever at all.
Remains accurate at all times. More consistent than [kdfss]
They are of decent quality and are the only non-Funimation subs.

It's rare for me that I'm upvoting DameDesuYo, but in this case, it's rather good translation (including honorifics - not for dumb people, who want americanized made up shit) especially if you compare it with alternaives aka commie&friends :|
